name: Mirror three
description: Introduction to the game Players need to simulate the employees of a restaurant to make all kinds of delicious food and drinks needed by customers. There are many ingredients in hamburger, including salad dressing, ketchup, bread slices, ham slices You need to match them reasonably according to the customer's needs, give them to the customer, and get monetary rewards. In order to increase the gameplay, you can't undo them in the matching process. If the matching is wrong, you can only throw them into the trash can. But this operation will deduct the material cost. Come and challenge your highest turnover!
